channel.title: Runethrive Cleaned Open Client Gets Error?
channel.description:
Hello. My friend, who has his own client with anti-decompiling, is rarely on. I want to create my own client, because he wont give anyone open source. I keep getting this error when loading the RuneThrive Open Source Client:
[code] RuneThrive's Client is Loading... Thank you for using the Cleaned Version Of the RuneThrive Client. --------------------------------------------------- no midi or mp3 files in folder connected to update server loading custom spirts part 1 loading custom spirts part 2 headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method135(client.java:11689) at client.method9(client.java:10428) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5378) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Runethrive Cleaned Open Client Gets Error?
item.dc:creator: @mrtms mrtms
item.description:
@mrtms wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:346158”]Anti-Decompiling, funny, anything can be decompiled and fixed. The problem is taking the time to fix it.

@Problem - I would look at other server/client releases, and find the one he based his from, and start from there. Nobody created a RS client from scratch, except Jagex.

Just get a new client and transfer the cache and configs.

I didn’t mean from scratch. I’m not sure what client to get anyway :([/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Runethrive Cleaned Open Client Gets Error?

item.title: Runethrive Cleaned Open Client Gets Error?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Anti-Decompiling, funny, anything can be decompiled and fixed. The problem is taking the time to fix it.

@Problem - I would look at other server/client releases, and find the one he based his from, and start from there. Nobody created a RS client from scratch, except Jagex.

Just get a new client and transfer the cache and configs.

Read full topic

Hello. My friend, who has his own client with anti-decompiling, is rarely on. I want to create my own client, because he wont give anyone open source. I keep getting this error when loading the RuneThrive Open Source Client:
